类 LUNManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • LUNManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LUNManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Created by Administrator on 2017/2/10. LUNManager is a singleton class instance which functions as a simulator to manage a pool of LUNs.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.Integer createLUN(java.lang.Integer size)
      Create a single LUN that will allocate a unique id as a key to put to the free LUN pool

      Create the number of Count LUN, each has an initial size of nodeSize.Each LUN will be put to the free LUN pool

      Expand the size of the LUN

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static LUNManager getInstance()

      • createLUN

        public java.lang.Integer createLUN(java.lang.Integer size)
        Create a single LUN that will allocate a unique id as a key to put to the free LUN pool
        参数:
        size - the initial size of a LUN to create
        返回:
        the id of the newly created LUN

      • createMultipleLUNs

        public boolean createMultipleLUNs(java.lang.Integer count,
                                  java.lang.Integer nodeSize)
        Create the number of Count LUN, each has an initial size of nodeSize.Each LUN will be put to the free LUN pool
        参数:
        count - The number of LUN to create
        nodeSize - The initial size for each LUN
        返回:
        true if all required LUN created successfully, false if any is failed

      • getNextAvailLUN

        public java.lang.Integer getNextAvailLUN()

      • exportLUN

        public boolean exportLUN(java.lang.Integer idLUN,
                         java.lang.Integer hostID)
        Export a specific LUN to the specified host. The LUN exported will be removed from the free pool and add to the map of exportLUN for manangement.
        参数:
        idLUN - The id of the LUN, which is the unique key for this LUN when initially created
        hostID - The host ID to export this LUN to
        返回:
        true if the specified LUN is free for use, and successfully exported to a host.

      • unexportLUN

        public void unexportLUN(java.lang.Integer idLUN)
        Unexport a specific LUN, which will cleared of the export host information, remmoved from the export map, and add to the un-exported map for management
        参数:
        idLUN - The id of the LUN

      • removeUnexportedLUN

        public void removeUnexportedLUN(java.lang.Integer idLUN)

      • getFreeLUNNode

        public LUNNode getFreeLUNNode(java.lang.Integer idLUN)

      • getLUNNode

        public LUNNode getLUNNode(java.lang.Integer idLUN)

      • getLUNSize

        public int getLUNSize(java.lang.Integer idLUN)
        Get the size of the LUN specified by the LUN ID
        参数:
        idLUN - the ID of the LUN
        返回:
        the size of the LUN

      • getExportedHostID

        public java.lang.Integer getExportedHostID(java.lang.Integer idLUN)
        Get the exported hostID of the LUN
        参数:
        idLUN - the ID of the LUN
        返回:
        the hostID of the LUN exported to

      • Expand

        public void Expand(java.lang.Integer idLUN,
                   int capacity)
        Expand the size of the LUN
        参数:
        idLUN - the ID of the LUN
        capacity - the size to expand to
